bill_title: direct the Department of Labor and Regulation to compile and report statistics related to poverty and workforce development on tribal lands.

bill_versions.bill_text: An Act to direct the Department of Labor and Regulation to compile and report statistics related to poverty and workforce development on tribal lands. Be it enacted by the Legislature of the State of South Dakota: Section 1. That chapter 1-37 be amended with a NEW SECTION: The Department of Labor and Regulation shall annually compile statistics related to poverty and workforce development for Native Americans on tribal lands as specified in this section. The Department of Labor and Regulation shall report these statistics to the Department of Tribal Relations and the nine federally recognized tribes in this state by January first of each year. The Department of Labor and Regulation shall compile and report, for each reservation and county wholly or partially within a reservation's boundaries: (1) Employment; (2) Unemployment; (3) Underemployment; (4) Median family income; (5) Personal income; (6) Disposable income; and (7) Per capita income.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
